name: Agkuza
description: Tear apart incoming enemies with this massive hooked blade.

name: Centaur
description: Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.

name: Corvas
description: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to obtain Corvas and Rathbone Blueprint parts.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with various Archwing parts not being included in Archwing Mission Droptables (Corvas, Fluctus).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.3.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Corvas charge shot not having any additional effect or damage.

name: Cyngas
description: Unload deadly accurate bursts of mayhem.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cyngas flaps unfolding inconsistently in several different ways when previewing it in the Archwing Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Archwing weapons (Cyngas) swapping to melee on empty fire.

name: Dual Decurion
description: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Dual Decurion blueprint appearing in Clan Tech, removed blueprint from Clan Tech Research. This is a Market blueprint for you to craft once you obtain the parts!

name: Fluctus
description: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to deal damage to the Jordas Golem from certain angles with the Fluctus.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to deal damage to the Jordas Golem from certain angles with the Fluctus.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Fluctus not doing any damage to turrets or buttons in the Jordas Verdict.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.9.2
patchlogs.changes: Reduced camera shake created by Fluctus projectiles.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with various Archwing parts not being included in Archwing Mission Droptables (Corvas, Fluctus).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Fluctus not doing any damage to the J-3 Golem.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed elemental damage Mods not increasing damage when applied to the Fluctus.

name: Grattler
description: Shatter your targets with explosive shells from this devastating Archwing cannon.

name: Imperator
description: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.1 - 22.17.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Imperator Vandal Blueprint     Common (38.72%)Shrine Of The Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.1.1:

patchlogs.name: Update 18.12.0: Vauban Prime & 18.12.1
patchlogs.changes: The Imperator Vandal Blueprint is now tradable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Day of the Dead Imperator Skin not showing an appropriate description in the Market. WOOOOOOO SPOOKY GHOST LEAK

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Imperator Vandal not displaying proper energy display color.

name: Kaszas
description: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kaszas not properly displaying channeling FX.

name: Knux
description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing audio on certain Knux attacks.

name: Onorix
description: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.1
patchlogs.changes: The Onorix’s Handle has now been added to Archwing Mobile Defense Mission drop tables.

name: Phaedra
description: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Phaedra not having proper audio FX.

name: Prisma Veritux
description: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Prisma Veritux not being Tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Prisma Veritux being untradeable.

name: Rathbone
description: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to obtain Corvas and Rathbone Blueprint parts.

name: Velocitus
description: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being able to damage a Fomorian Core multiple times with a single shot using the Velocitus.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Velocitus weapon fire sound ending prematurely, also corrected various weapon fire animations.

name: Veritux
description: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Prisma Veritux not being Tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Prisma Veritux being untradeable.

name: Amesha
description: Transform into a winged guardian.

abilities.name: Benevolent Decoy
abilities.description: Creates beacons that draw enemy fire, converting the damage into healing pulses.

abilities.name: Vengeful Rush
abilities.description: All damage taken is transformed into Energy, while abilities gain enhanced Range, Duration and Power. Affects the Warframe and nearby allies.

abilities.name: Warding Grace
abilities.description: Renders the Warframe and nearby allies immune to Status Effects, while slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Watchful Swarm
abilities.description: Tiny drones orbit the Warframe or an ally, and intercept enemy fire.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Archwing disabler projectiles not being affected by bullet attractor pulls (Mag, Amesha, etc)

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Amesha’s Watchful Swarm not ending if you exit Archwing modeas per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/704078-ameshas-watchful-swarm-animation-doesnt-end-when-you-resurface-in-uranus/

name: Elytron
description: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.

abilities.name: Bloomer
abilities.description: Fires a high-yield, remotely detonated explosive projectile capable of latching onto targets.

abilities.name: Core Vent
abilities.description: Vents out the Archwing's propulsion core, confusing enemy projectiles and causing them to detonate.

abilities.name: Thumper
abilities.description: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.

abilities.name: Warhead
abilities.description: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: More fixes towards Energy color issues when using Core Vent on the Elytron.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients seeing duplicate visual FX trails from the Elytron’s exhaust.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the particle FX on Elytron’s Core Vent Ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: The Elytron`s Thumper will now combine with previous Thumpers if it detonates within its radius. This will refresh the duration on the previous Thumper and allow damage to stack up to 4 times.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed another issue causing players to take damage from Elytron’s Warhead ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue allowing players to take damage from Elytron’s Warhead.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Elytron Warhead damage and radius not increasing when ranked up.

name: Itzal
description: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: The Itzal Archwing teleports a short distance, dropping all enemy target locks.

abilities.name: Cosmic Crush
abilities.description: Forms a miniature black hole that sucks in all nearby objects before rupturing in a massive shock wave.

abilities.name: Fighter Escort
abilities.description: Deploys drones that fight alongside the Warframe, each detonating in a destructive blast when killed.

abilities.name: Penumbra
abilities.description: Activates a cloaking field that hides the Warframe and any nearby allies who remain stationary.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes towards a progression stopping issue where Jordas would not dock properly caused by Itzal’s Blink stun effect.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes towards Bounties insta failing if an ability to teleport (Nova’s Wormhole, Itzal’s Blink, etc) was used to enter the Bounty area.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal Fighter Escorts causing camera issues.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal's Blink colliding with Odonata's Energy Shell as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/705690-itzals-blink-broken-interaction-with-energy-field/

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to move while casting Itzal’s Penumbra as a Client.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 11
patchlogs.changes: The Archwing Quest will no longer be given upon a player reaching Mastery Rank 2 since is it now a Junction reward.*Please Note That A Script To Refund Those Who Have Crafted The Itzal Prior To This Hotfix Is In Progress. We Will Update This Thread Once The Script Is Done. The Refund Script Is Complete!:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that would occur after the Itzal’s drones would die.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several issues causing players to become stuck in terrain after using the Itzal’s Blink Ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being able to teleport through terrain using the Itzal during Stage 3 of the Jordas Verdict.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue during Stage 3 of the Jordas Verdict when using Itzal’s Blink ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Itzal's Blink was not usable in Archwing Mobile Defense.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal’s Cloak not deactivating on movement.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed kills from Chroma’s Effigy, Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead and the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort not counting towards player stats.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal Archwing’s Codex entry to display a Warframe wearing the Itzal in the diorama.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort drones explosion range not properly increasing as you rank up.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed typo in the Itzal Pack Market description.

name: Odonata
description: The systems built into this Archwing balance offensive capabilities with defensive countermeasures.

abilities.name: Disarray
abilities.description: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.

abilities.name: Energy Shell
abilities.description: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: The Warframe emits a massive pulse of energy, stunning nearby enemies and sending them flying.

abilities.name: Seeking Fire
abilities.description: Fires a large volley of homing missiles.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal's Blink colliding with Odonata's Energy Shell as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/705690-itzals-blink-broken-interaction-with-energy-field/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Odonata Archwing’s Seeking Fire Ability doing damage to the player on use.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue caused by building the Odonata while the Archwing Quest is still inactive, causing an error when activating the quest in the World State Window.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed generic Archwing Mods saying they are compatible with only the Odonata.  They will now properly say ‘Archwing’.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Odonata’s Energy Shell impeding Melee attack homing on enemies.
